generated.css: html{padding:0;margin:0;min-height:100%;box-sizing:border-box;border:0 solid #e5e7eb}html body{font-family:Courier New,Courier,monospace;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;background-image:url(/191fdea1a1308a51ff9b4eee10771743.jpg);background-size:cover;background-repeat:no-repeat;margin:0}li{list-style:none}a{text-decoration:none}header{width:100%;-webkit-backdrop-filter:blur(5px);backdrop-filter:blur(5px);display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;box-shadow:inset 0 -10px 10px -10px rgba(0,0,0,.75);padding:5px}header #logo{width:70%;height:4em;padding:3px;margin:8px auto auto;align-items:center}header #logo,header #logo a{border:1px solid #000;display:flex;justify-content:center}header #logo a{height:100%;width:30%}header #logo a img{border:1px solid #000;width:100%;background-size:contain;height:100%}header #logo h3{margin-left:30px;font-family:cursive;color:#adff2f}header nav{width:100%;margin-top:.8em;padding:2px}header nav ol{display:flex;height:3em;align-items:center;justify-content:center}header nav ol li{margin-left:1.5em}header nav ol li a{color:#e5e7eb;border:2px solid transparent;border-radius:6px;padding:.6em}header nav ol li a:hover{border:2px solid #fff;background-color:rgba(74,70,70,.756);-webkit-animation-duration:.5s;animation-duration:.5s}header nav ol #action{margin-left:5em;display:flex;padding:3px;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;float:right}header nav ol #action a{margin-left:.5em;color:#e5e7eb;border:2px solid transparent;border-radius:6px;padding:.6em}header nav ol #action a:hover{border:2px solid #fff;background-color:rgba(74,70,70,.756);-webkit-animation-duration:.5s;animation-duration:.5s}header nav:hover{-webkit-backdrop-filter:blur(30px);backdrop-filter:blur(30px)}main{margin-top:25vh;width:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column}main,main #section1{justify-content:center;align-items:center}main #section1{width:80vw;padding:1em;margin:auto;display:grid;gap:7em;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,100px);grid-auto-columns:repeat(3,minmax(0,1fr))}main #section1 a{width:140px;height:140px;padding:.5em;margin:auto;border:1px solid #000;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;-webkit-backdrop-filter:blur(20px);backdrop-filter:blur(20px);border-radius:10px}main #section1 a img{width:90%;height:70%;margin-left:5px;margin-top:5px}main #section1 a h3{width:90%;margin:auto;text-align:center}main #section1 a:hover{border:1px solid #fff;color:#000;-webkit-backdrop-filter:blur(10px);backdrop-filter:blur(10px);transform:translateY(-10px);scale:1.1;box-shadow:0 0 20px 0 #000}main #section1 a:hover h3{color:#e5e7eb}main #section2{width:80vw;margin:30vh auto 10vh;padding:5px;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;border-radius:10px;-webkit-backdrop-filter:blur(40px);backdrop-filter:blur(40px)}main #section2 #thti{width:80vw;height:1.5em;margin:auto;text-align:center;padding:3em}main #section2 #thti h1{color:#19c319;font-family:cursive;font-weight:500}main #section2 #thti h1:hover{scale:1.1;font-weight:bolder}main #section2 #thti_storie{width:90%;margin:5vh auto auto}main #section2:hover{-webkit-backdrop-filter:blur(15px);backdrop-filter:blur(15px);color:#fff}footer{height:50vh;width:100%;border-top:2px solid #000;background-color:#4c4545;align-items:center}footer,footer #pied1,footer #pied2{display:flex;justify-content:center}footer #pied1,footer #pied2{width:30vw}footer #pied_centre{flex-grow:1;width:40vw;height:85%}footer #pied_centre,footer #pied_centre ol{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}footer #pied_centre ol{width:80%;height:80%;margin:auto}footer #pied_centre ol li{width:25%;margin-right:2em;display:flex;justify-content:space-around;align-items:center;padding:1px}footer #pied_centre ol li a{width:100%;height:100%}footer #pied_centre ol li a img{width:40px;height:40px;margin:auto}
